title: Wish Blossom
team: Myeongseong Kim, Kyeongho Park, Sohyun Park, Wonyoung Lee, Seunghyeon Han, Woohun Lee
summary: an interactive installation that transforms fleeting cherry blossom petals into a poetic expression of visitors’ wishes.
As petals flutter and settle, a symbolic keyword emerges, capturing the essence of each wish in a moment of ephemeral beauty.

paragraph: “Wish Blossom” is an interactive installation that creates a magical experience,
inviting visitors to interact with gently fluttering cherry blossom petals carried by a soft spring breeze,
sending their wishes and immersing themselves in the moment.
Cherry blossoms, often seen as a symbol of spring and fleeting beauty, carry the myth that catching a falling petal can make a wish come true.
The installation mirrors a parallel between the limited duration of a festive exhibition and the ephemeral nature of cherry blossoms,
while capturing the essence of the visitors’ wishes and expressing the hope that they will come true.
